description:
Play the world national teams soccer cup while it is played by your favourite national team.
With its fast action and intense gameplay, this soccer game will provide you long hours of fun especially if you are a soccer fan.

Key Features :
-Single Match or Tournament mode
-3 levels of device AI
-League Champhionships (6 or 8 teams)
-Different teams formations to select
-International Cup (4 or 8 teams)
-Grass or dry Fields
name: World Soccer Cup 2022
